abstract: New York Mets Manager Terry Collins faces complex task of filling out team's lineup before every game, and he relies heavily on a new tool, one-page chart the Mets' analytic team refers to as the 'Matrix'; based on an internally-developed algorithm, chart gives each Mets hitter a score for how he might perform against any of opposing pitchers they may face in a given game.
lead_paragraph: Manager Terry Collins has a new tool as he tries to maximize the Mets’ offensive output daily, although he has been instructed not to reveal too much.

headline.main: Mets Find Lineup Solutions in a Single, Mysterious Chart
